title: Simple Machines and Work

vocab.definition: A basic tool that makes work easier
A bar that moves on a fixed point to lift things
A ramp or slope that makes lifting easier
A wheel with a rope that helps lift heavy objects
Two parts that turn together to reduce friction and move things
A tool with a pointed edge that splits or cuts things

teachingNotes: Use classroom examples like scissors (lever), ramps (inclined plane), and flagpoles (pulley). Let students identify simple machines around school.

expectedAny: the amount or direction of force
